title: How to Bake Deep Dish Plum and Black Cherry Pie

steps.headline: Mix crust ingredients in a large mixing bowl until dough is smooth.
Divide dough into two portions.
steps.description: One should be about 2/3 of the dough. Roll the portions into balls.

steps.headline: Wrap dough in wax paper, and place in freezer.
steps.description: Dough should stay there for at least 30 minutes

steps.headline: Spray pie pan with non-stick cooking spray.
Roll out the larger portion of dough until it is approximately ⁄8 inch (0.3 cm) thick.
Place dough into the pie pan, pressing down so that it is tight against the pan.
Roll out the smaller portion of dough.
steps.description: Drape over filling, and seal edges of two dough portions together.

steps.headline: Puncture the top crust with a butter knife.
Bake for 30 minutes, until crust is crispy and fruit inside is soft.

text: Mix crust ingredients in a large mixing bowl until dough is smooth.  Divide dough into two portions. One should be about 2/3 of the dough. Roll the portions into balls. Wrap dough in wax paper, and place in freezer. Dough should stay there for at least 30 minutes Preheat oven to 400 degrees.  Spray pie pan with non-stick cooking spray.  Mix filling ingredients thoroughly.  Roll out the larger portion of dough until it is approximately ⁄8 inch (0.3 cm) thick.  Place dough into the pie pan, pressing down so that it is tight against the pan.  Pour in filling ingredients.  Roll out the smaller portion of dough. Drape over filling, and seal edges of two dough portions together. Puncture the top crust with a butter knife.  Bake for 30 minutes, until crust is crispy and fruit inside is soft.  Serve!
